Heatran (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0484: Palkia
Pokémon
#0486: Regigigas →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Heatran (TCG Pocket).

Heatran has been featured on 22 different cards since it debuted in the Legends Awakened expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Heatran cards are normally Fire-type or Metal-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Heatran

Heatran
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
